duplicate module loaded: Loaded module {id} versions {v1} and {v2}; change your module imports to only load one copy of a module.
bad yaml format first line: Expected yaml file `{path}` to have `---` by itself on the first line.
json file not array or object: Invalid json format in file `{path}`: file does not contain either an array or object.
schema file must contain only one entry: Schema definition files must contain exactly one entry: `{path}`
missing id field: Module data value must have 'id' field.
required attribute: Module data value of type {type} requires attribute named {attribute}
list file hex code: Error in input file: Invalid hex code in line data: {value}
not valid value: Expected value to be a `{expected}`, but found `{value}`
not valid date mapping: Not a valid localization date `from` value: `{from}`
invalid radix: Invalid radix for number ({radix}); must be between 2 and 36.
no domain in localized format: Invalid localized format: no domain in format ({format}) or value ({value})
bad format no format name: Invalid format - missing format name before ':': {format}
incomplete format string: Invalid format - expression evaluation not complete: {format}
embedded format no value: Invalid format - embedded format does not reference a value: {format}
dangling , in value list: Invalid format - dangling ',' in value list: {format}
no embedded template in value: Embedded templates are not allowed for template values: {format}
too many values in template: Incorrect number of values provided in the value list: you provided {actual}, but it must be between {min} and {max}
two equals for key pair: Incorrect key-value expression in the value list - at most one equal ('=') allowed for a key-value: {format}
module file contents: The module file must have only one entry, and be a module type
no argument for template: The `{name}` template must have an argument
not module value: The value is not a valid module object
changed immutable value: Attempted to alter value of type {type}
invalid function dependency value: Function {func} requires a number value at {path} but found {type}
undefined attribute definition for value: {valueType} referenced as defined from non-existant attribute
empty group value set: {path} is a group value set with no matching entries
non-numeric value type: {value} should have been a numeric type
